title: Mortgage rescue fraud; consumer education
context: ยง480E-2.5 Mortgage rescue fraud; consumer education. The office of consumer protection shall educate consumers about abusive practices that may be committed against consumers who may be offered mortgage assistance relief services or who face property foreclosures, liens, or encumbrances, as appropriate. [L 2012, c 183, pt of ยง1; am L 2016, c 142, ยง4]
